description: Success message displayed when workspace settings are saved
Title for details page of current workspace
Subtitle for details page of current workspace
defaultMessage: Add details to your Check workspace.

description: Label of a button to duplicate a workspace
Label of the button that saves workspace details
Label for a button to change a workspace image
Title of the profile section in team details page
Title of the link management section in team details page
Label for a switch where the user toggles link management in team details page
Helper text for link management switcher when workspace has RSS newsletters configured
defaultMessage: The link service cannot be disabled while RSS newsletters are configured in this workspace

description: Helper text for UTM code field
defaultMessage: Customize the UTM code appended to links. Leave blank to disable UTM codes.

description: Text displayed in the title of a warning box on team details page when link shortening is on
defaultMessage: All links sent via Check will be rewritten.

description: Text displayed in the content of a warning box on team details page when link shortening is on
defaultMessage: The rewritten links will also include the UTM code if provided. The UTM code does not change the destination URL.{br}{br}{before} https://www.example.com/your-link{br}{after} https://chck.media/x1y2z3w4/{code}
